app.name: Cool Spidey Outfit
app.long_description:
Patch your 'Spider-Man 2' game ISO to change to a different spidey suit.
* SPIDER-MAN 2000 (N64/PS/DC) * Black Suit 2000 * Black Suit 2007 * Spider-Man 2099 * Black Suit 2099 * Super Silverizer * Barbie x BLACKPINK * Green With Evil * Restore Original * Load suit.tpl from storage
